signup_prompt: Don't have an account? Sign up here
reset_instruction: Enter your email to receive a password reset link.
reset_success: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox.
email_password_change_detected: Changes to your email and password have been detected on another device. You need to log in again.
email_change_detected: An email change has been detected on another device. You need to log in again.
password_change_detected: A password change has been detected on another device. You need to log in again.
profile_updated_other_device: Your profile has been updated on another device.
name_photo_updated_other_device: Your name and profile picture have been updated on another device.
name_updated_other_device: Your name has been updated on another device.
photo_updated_other_device: Your profile picture has been updated on another device.
account_deleted_remotely: Your account has been deleted from another device. You will be redirected to the login screen.
session_closed_unexpectedly: Session closed unexpectedly. Please log in again.
session_expired_message: Your session has expired or could not be verified. Please log in again.
confirm_logout_message: Are you sure you want to log out?
confirm_delete_account_message: Do you really want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
delete_account_invalid_user: There is no valid authenticated user.
chat_empty: No messages yet. Start the conversation!
chat_blocked_message: You can't send messages because you have blocked this user
chat_blocked_by_other: You can't send messages because this user has blocked you
chat_confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
chat_confirm_block_message: Are you sure you want to block this user? You will not receive messages from them.
chat_confirm_unblock_message: Are you sure you want to unblock this user? You will receive messages from them again.
chat_list_empty_subtitle: When you send a message to someone, it will appear here.
remove_participant_message: Are you sure you want to remove {0} from the activity?
confirm_delete_activity_content: Are you sure you want to delete this activity? This action cannot be undone.
user_has_rated_activity: You have already rated this activity.
remove_participant_dialog_content: Are you sure you want to remove {participantName} from the activity?
no_activities_found: No activities found matching your criteria.
error_identifying_user_unblock: Could not identify your user. Please log in again.
unblock_user_dialog_content: Are you sure you want to unblock this user? You will be able to see their messages and activities again.
unblock_user_error_message: Could not unblock user. Try again.
no_blocked_users_description: You haven't blocked any users yet.
no_activity_invitations: You have no invitations to join activities
no_ratings_yet_message: You haven't made any ratings yet
terms_section_1_content: By using the AirPlan application ("the Application"), you automatically agree to these Terms and Conditions of Use and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our service.
terms_section_2_content:
2.1. To access certain features, you must create an account with an email and password.

2.2. You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your access credentials.

2.3. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized access to your account.
terms_section_3_content:
3.1. You agree to use the Application only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms.

3.2. You may not:
   • Use the Application fraudulently or deceptively
   • Violate intellectual property rights
   • Upload malicious content or viruses
   • Alter the normal functioning of the Application
terms_section_4_content:
4.1. AirPlan and its logos are registered trademarks.

4.2. All intellectual property rights in the Application’s content and design belong exclusively to us or our licensors.

4.3. You may not copy, modify, or distribute any part of the Application without written permission.
terms_section_5_content:
5.1. The Application is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind.

5.2. We are not liable for:
   • Indirect, special, or consequential damages
   • Loss of data or profits
   • Service interruptions not caused by our negligence
terms_section_6_content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Updated versions will take effect immediately upon publication in the Application. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
terms_section_7_content: These terms are governed by the laws of Spain. Any dispute shall be resolved in the competent courts of Barcelona, with express waiver of any other jurisdiction.
content_filter_service_active: The Perspective API service is globally active.
content_filter_service_inactive: The Perspective API service is globally inactive.
content_filter_do_not_store_active: The API will NOT store the request text.
content_filter_do_not_store_inactive: The API may store the request text (default).
content_filter_span_annotations_active: Span annotations will be requested from the API.
content_filter_span_annotations_inactive: Span annotations will not be requested (default).
content_filter_threshold_description: Enable and adjust the threshold (0.0 - 1.0) for each toxicity attribute. A higher threshold is more permissive.
content_filter_important_note_content: The Perspective API Key is managed directly in the backend configuration. Make sure thresholds are between 0.0 and 1.0. Changes will be applied after saving.
content_filter_threshold_error: The threshold for "{0}" must be a number between 0.0 and 1.0.
delete_account_requires_relogin: You need to log in again to delete your account.
register_agree_terms: I agree to the terms and conditions
register_have_account_login: Already have an account? Log in
location_services_disabled: Location services are disabled. Please enable them.
account_deleted_message: Your account has been deleted from another device. This session will close automatically.
